oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Sgt. John Dickson and Sallie Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of Sgt. John D. Dickson, Co. B, 54th Inf. Regt., and Sallie Jones at Ft. Oglethorpe, Georgia. They met during his service and married after the war. He was working as a rancher in Montana before the war but returned to his hometown of Chicago to enlist.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dickson, John; Jones, Sallie
